name: Morph!
description:
Morph is a casual indie game that allows you to play in a variety of styles, such as 'possessing' over 100 different objects in a given world to find and chase other players, or quietly hiding.

Possess yourself with another object!
Possess with a variety of objects to blend in perfectly with your surroundings to hide your presence and strategically gain a tactical advantage.


Find other players!
Find, chase, and slay other players.


Hide naturally!
Hide your possessed object inconspicuously by blending it seamlessly into its environment.


Use your skills!
Create your own play style by combining various skills and enjoy the game.


Play with variety maps!
Enjoy the game using numerous objects on maps of various concepts.
